trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that creates an animated bouncing effect.
trans-unit.target: 表示緩動函式，這個函式會建立動畫彈跳效果。

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrates <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase> using different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: 下圖示範<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase>上使用的不同值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>，其中*f*(*t*) 表示的動畫進度和*t*代表時間。

trans-unit.source: ![BounceEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode graphs.")
trans-unit.target: ![BounceEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode 圖形。")

trans-unit.source: You can specify how many bounces occur using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces%2A> property and specify how bouncy (how elastic the bounces are) using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定多少彈回發生使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces%2A>屬性，並指定如何彈跳 （如何彈性彈回是） 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A> property specifies the amplitude scaling of the next bounce.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A>屬性指定的下一個彈回幅度縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: For example, a bounciness value of 2 doubles the amplitude of the next bounce during an ease in, and it halves the amplitude of the next bounce during an ease out.
trans-unit.target: 例如，bounciness 值為 2 會加倍下一步彈回振幅期間，輕鬆和它期間減速分母的下一個彈回幅度。

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase> which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: 有數個其他加/減速函數除了<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase>其中您可以瀏覽 使用下列的 Silverlight 範例。

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery)
trans-unit.target: [執行這個範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery)

trans-unit.source: In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用加/減速函數包含在執行階段中，您可以建立您自己自訂的加/減速函數透過繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Object Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 物件項目用法

trans-unit.source: The following example applies a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase> easing function to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> to create a bouncing effect.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase>easing 函式可<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>建立彈跳的效果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of bounces.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定彈跳的次數。

trans-unit.source: The number of bounces.
trans-unit.target: 彈跳的次數。

trans-unit.source: The value must be greater than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個值必須大於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: Negative values resolve to zero.
trans-unit.target: 負數值會解析為零。

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 3。

trans-unit.source: This property does not include the final half-bounce.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不包含最終的半彈回。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how bouncy the bounce animation is.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定彈跳動畫的彈性。

trans-unit.source: Low values of this property result in bounces with little lose of height between bounces (more bouncy) while high values result in dampened bounces (less bouncy).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的低值會讓每次的彈跳減低少許高度 (更有彈性)，高值則會造成較弱的彈跳 (較少彈性)。

trans-unit.source: The value that specifies how bouncy the bounce animation is.
trans-unit.target: 指定彈跳動畫之彈性的值。

trans-unit.source: This value must be positive.
trans-unit.target: 這個值必須是正數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>2</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>2</c>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 衍生類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 建立衍生類別時，您必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: 動畫類別間接繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>建構自訂動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a typical implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範典型實作<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的標準化時間 (進度)。

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn" /> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: 提供 easing 函式的邏輯部分，您可將其覆寫以產生自訂 easing 函式的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn" /> 模式。

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: 表示已轉換進度的雙精度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法來轉換控制的動畫的速度的標準化的時間<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn>案例<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseOut> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseInOut> cases.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要指定您加/減速函數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn>因為大小寫的實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>方法轉換`normalizedTime`如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseOut>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseInOut>案例。
